title: 有個普通人人生可以識到幾多人

replies.msg:
有時係到諗
淨係讀書已經好幾班人
出到黎做野又好幾班人
點解好似冇咩朋友咁

好幾班大多數都係hi bye
熟咪得幾個
人大左，“朋友”的意思同小時候不同了，“朋友”關係即交易人關係

quote.msg: 人大左，“朋友”的意思同小時候不同了，“朋友”關係即交易人關係

replies.msg:
“男女朋友”甚至所有關係皆是


As long as no any more trading happen between the people in a relationship, the relationship breaks.

The real scenes of our lives in this society of pure lust and money worshiping are totally different from the silly lies of TV comedy and popular romance fiction.

You should know that everything in your mind about the real world which were taught by the fucking televisions(tell lies visions) and FB are just illusions and the actual purpose of these is only mastering the puppets of us and making people be battery, but not to make our lives better at any degree.
